description:
Rockwood Coin is a rapidly growing form of digital currency - similar to your favorite stores loyalty/rewards point system or your credit card. This form of digital currency can be used as a traditional form of payment and is commonly referred to as “cryptocurrency”.
Rockwood Coin is used with a wallet on Android, iOS or through a website. Using Rockwood Coin is just as easy as using traditional paper currency. Purchasing a plane ticket, booking a hotel or buying a new pair of shoes, just checkout with your Rockwood Coin and you’re done. You can even trade in your Rockwood Coin for other currencies.
Rockwood Coin’s valuation is based on trading, usage, business acquisitions and investments. Unlike typical currencies and cryptocurrencies which are only powered by trading amount and usage Rockwood Coin owners and holders will receive dividends off our investments.
name: Rockwood Coin
